name: typescript-strictly-typed
description: Enable configurations for strictly typed TypeScript, ESLint or TSLint, and optionally Angular.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md bin/cli dist
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish dist && git push && git push --tags

author: Cyrille Tuzi
